title: 92/87/EEC: Commission Decision of 18 December 1991 on transitional measures applicable to Portuguese imports from other Member States of products of the pigmeat, egg and poultrymeat sectors (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 18 December 1991  on transitional measures applicable to Portuguese imports from other Member States of products of the pigmeat, egg and poultrymeat sectors  (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)  (92/87/EEC)
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Portuguese Republic is hereby authorized to apply from 1 January to 31 December 1992 special duties, the amounts of which are set out in Annexes I and II, on imports from other Member States of the products listed in these Annexes.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
